name: A-JLib
short_description:
A simple java library with Swing widgets and other stuff.
This library tries to simplify the development of Swing applications ... which is sometime a nightmare !
It contains the classes I developed during the Yapbam project in order to deal with the problems I encountered.

This work is still under progress and some things may be changed in the future (especially some class names).
The classes available here are quite stable and used in the Yapbam project.

AJlib is also available through Maven
GroupId: com.fathzer
ArtifactId: ajlib
summary: A simple java lib with Swing widgets and other stuff.
